text: The mum - to - be answered fan's tweets earlier today, and one fan asked how far along the reality star is. Khloe replied,'I'll be six months next week.'Khloe also responded to several other tweet's in relation to her pregnancy. One fan noted that Khloe's belly appeared to be small for 6 months along, but responded that it appears different at varying parts of the day. The expecting mum also stepped out on Christmas Eve for the annual Kardashian Christmas bash, and even posted a snap cradling her growing bump.
